trans-unit.source: about_Providers
trans-unit.target: about_Providers

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Providers
trans-unit.target: 有关提供程序

trans-unit.source: about_Providers
trans-unit.target: about_Providers

trans-unit.source: TOPIC
trans-unit.target: TOPIC

trans-unit.source: about_Providers
trans-unit.target: about_Providers

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Describes how Windows PowerShell providers provide access to data and components that would not otherwise be easily accessible at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 介绍了 Windows PowerShell 提供程序如何提供对数据以及将不能轻松地访问在命令行的组件访问。

trans-unit.source: The data is presented in a consistent format that resembles a file system drive.
trans-unit.target: 数据呈现在一致的格式类似于文件系统驱动器。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell providers are Microsoft .NET Framework-based programs that make the data in a specialized data store available in Windows PowerShell so that you can view and manage it.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 提供程序是 Microsoft 基于.NET Framework 的程序，使数据在专用的数据存储区中可用 Windows PowerShell 中，以便您可以查看和管理它。

trans-unit.source: The data that a provider exposes appears in a drive, and you access the data in a path like you would on a hard disk drive.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供程序公开的数据显示在驱动器中，并访问就像在硬盘驱动器上的路径中的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the built-in cmdlets that the provider supports to manage the data in the provider drive.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用任何提供程序支持来管理提供程序驱动器中的数据的内置 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: And, you can use custom cmdlets that are designed especially for the data.
trans-unit.target: 并且，您可以使用设计的自定义 cmdlet 尤其是对于数据。

trans-unit.source: The providers can also add dynamic parameters to the built-in cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序还可以添加到内置 cmdlet 的动态参数。

trans-unit.source: These are parameters that are available only when you use the cmdlet with the provider data.
trans-unit.target: 这些是仅当提供程序数据与使用 cmdlet 才可用的参数。

trans-unit.source: BUILT-IN PROVIDERS
trans-unit.target: 内置提供程序

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell includes a set of built-in providers that you can use to access the different types of data stores.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 包括一套可用于访问不同类型的数据存储的内置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Provider Drive Data store
trans-unit.target: 提供程序驱动器数据存储区

trans-unit.source: Alias Alias: Windows PowerShell aliases
trans-unit.target: 别名别名︰ Windows PowerShell 别名

trans-unit.source: Certificate Cert: x509 certificates for digital signatures
trans-unit.target: 数字签名的证书 Cert: x509 证书

trans-unit.source: Environment Env: Windows environment variables
trans-unit.target: 环境 Env: Windows 环境变量

trans-unit.source: FileSystem * File system drives, directories, and files
trans-unit.target: 文件系统 * 文件系统驱动器、 目录和文件

trans-unit.source: Function Function: Windows PowerShell functions
trans-unit.target: 函数︰ Windows PowerShell 函数

trans-unit.source: Registry HKLM:, HKCU: Windows registry
trans-unit.target: 注册表 HKLM:、 HKCU: Windows 注册表

trans-unit.source: Variable Variable: Windows PowerShell variables
trans-unit.target: 变量的变量︰ Windows PowerShell 变量

trans-unit.source: WSMan WSMan: WS-Management configuration information
trans-unit.target: WSMan WSMan: WS 管理组件配置信息

trans-unit.source: The FileSystem drives vary on each system.
trans-unit.target: 在每个系统上，文件系统驱动器会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: You can also create your own Windows PowerShell providers, and you can install providers that others develop.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以创建自己的 Windows PowerShell 提供程序，而且您可以安装其他人开发的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers that are available in your session, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-psprovider
trans-unit.target: get psprovider

trans-unit.source: INSTALLING AND REMOVING PROVIDERS
trans-unit.target: 安装和删除提供程序

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell providers are delivered to you in Windows PowerShell snap-ins, which are .NET Framework-based programs that are compiled into .dll files.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 提供程序是向您发送到 Windows PowerShell 管理单元中，将编译为.dll 文件的基于.NET Framework 的程序。

trans-unit.source: The snap-ins can include providers and cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 管理单元可以包含提供程序和 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Before you use the provider features, you have to install the snap-in and then add it to your Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: 使用访问接口功能之前，您必须安装在管理单元并将其添加到你的 Windows PowerShell 会话。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_PSSnapins.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_PSSnapins。

trans-unit.source: You cannot uninstall a provider, although you can remove the Windows PowerShell snap-in for the provider from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 尽管您可以删除 Windows PowerShell 管理单元提供程序从当前会话，则无法卸载提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If you do, you will remove all the contents of the snap-in, including its cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样做，则将删除在管理单元，包括其 cmdlet 中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: To remove a provider from the current session, use the Remove-PSSnapin cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要从当前会话中删除提供程序，使用 Remove-pssnapin cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not uninstall the provider, but it makes the provider unavailable in the session.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不会卸载该提供程序，但它使提供程序在会话中不可用。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Remove-PSDrive cmdlet to remove any drive from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 Remove-psdrive cmdlet 从当前会话中删除任何驱动器。

trans-unit.source: This data on the drive is not affected, but the drive is no longer available in that session.
trans-unit.target: 不影响此驱动器上的数据，但驱动器不再在该会话中可用。

trans-unit.source: VIEWING PROVIDERS
trans-unit.target: 查看提供程序

trans-unit.source: To view the Windows PowerShell providers on your computer, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要查看您的计算机上的 Windows PowerShell 提供程序，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-psprovider
trans-unit.target: get psprovider

trans-unit.source: The output lists the built-in providers and the providers that you added to the session.
trans-unit.target: 列出输出的内置提供程序和提供程序添加到会话。

trans-unit.source: THE PROVIDER CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: 提供程序 CMDLET

trans-unit.source: The following cmdlets are designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: 以下 cmdlet 用于处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use the same cmdlets in the same way to manage the different types of data that providers expose.
trans-unit.target: 相同的方式来管理不同类型的提供程序公开的数据，可以使用相同 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: After you learn to manage the data of one provider, you can use the same procedures with the data from any provider.
trans-unit.target: 您将了解如何管理一个提供程序的数据后，您可以使用任何提供程序中的数据使用相同的过程。

trans-unit.source: For example, the New-Item cmdlet creates a new item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，New-item cmdlet 创建一个新项。

trans-unit.source: In the C: drive that is supported by the FileSystem provider, you can use New-Item to create a new file or folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 c︰ 驱动器中支持的 FileSystem 提供程序，可以使用新项创建新的文件或文件夹。

trans-unit.source: In the drives that are supported by the Registry provider, you can use New-Item to create a new registry key.
trans-unit.target: 在由注册表提供程序支持的驱动器，可以使用新项以创建新的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: In the Alias: drive, you can use New-Item to create a new alias.
trans-unit.target: 在 Alias︰ 驱动器中，您可以使用新项来创建一个新别名。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about any of the following cmdlets, type:
trans-unit.target: 有关任何以下 cmdlet 的详细信息，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-help <cmdlet-name> -detailed
trans-unit.target: get-help < t e >-detailed

trans-unit.source: CHILDITEM CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: CHILDITEM CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Get-ChildItem
trans-unit.target: Get-ChildItem

trans-unit.source: CONTENT CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: CONTENT CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Add-Content Clear-Content Get-Content Set-Content
trans-unit.target: 添加内容 Clear-content Get-content 集内容

trans-unit.source: ITEM CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: ITEM CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Clear-Item Copy-Item Get-Item Invoke-Item Move-Item New-Item Remove-Item Rename-Item Set-Item
trans-unit.target: Clear-item Copy-item Get-item Invoke-item Move-item 新项删除项重命名项 Set-item

trans-unit.source: ITEMPROPERTY CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: ITEMPROPERTY CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Clear-ItemProperty Copy-ItemProperty Get-ItemProperty Move-ItemProperty New-ItemProperty Remove-ItemProperty Rename-ItemProperty Set-ItemProperty
trans-unit.target: Clear-itemproperty 副本-ItemProperty Get-itemproperty 移动-ItemProperty New-itemproperty 删除-ItemProperty Rename-itemproperty Set-itemproperty

trans-unit.source: LOCATION CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: 位置 CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Get-Location Pop-Location Push-Location Set-Location
trans-unit.target: Get-location Pop-location Push-location 将当前位置设置位置

trans-unit.source: PATH CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: 路径 CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Join-Path Convert-Path Split-Path Resolve-Path Test-Path
trans-unit.target: 联接路径转换路径拆分路径 Resolve-path 测试路径

trans-unit.source: PSDRIVE CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: PSDRIVE CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Get-PSDrive New-PSDrive Remove-PSDrive
trans-unit.target: Get-psdrive 新-PSDrive Remove-psdrive

trans-unit.source: PSPROVIDER CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: PSPROVIDER CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Get-PSProvider
trans-unit.target: Get-psprovider

trans-unit.source: VIEWING PROVIDER DATA
trans-unit.target: 查看提供程序的数据

trans-unit.source: The primary benefit of a provider is that it exposes its data in a familiar and consistent way.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供程序的主要优点是它熟悉而一致的方式公开其数据。

trans-unit.source: The model for data presentation is a file system drive.
trans-unit.target: 数据表示的模型是文件系统驱动器。

trans-unit.source: To use data that the provider exposes, you view it, move through it, and change it as though it were data on a hard drive.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的提供程序公开的数据，查看它、 通过它，将移动和更改它，就好像它是在硬盘上的数据。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the most important information about a provider is the name of the drive that it supports.
trans-unit.target: 因此，有关提供程序最重要的信息是驱动器的它支持的名称。

trans-unit.source: The drive is listed in the default display of the Get-PSProvider cmdlet, but you can get information about the provider drive by using the Get-PSDrive cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Get-psprovider cmdlet 的默认显示中列出该驱动器，但可以通过使用 Get-psdrive cmdlet 获取有关提供程序驱动器的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, to get all the properties of the Function: drive, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要获取的函数的所有属性︰ 驱动器中，键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-psdrive Function | format-list *
trans-unit.target: get psdrive 函数 |格式列表 *

trans-unit.source: You can view and move through the data in a provider drive just as you would on a file system drive.
trans-unit.target: 您可以查看和浏览提供程序驱动器中的数据，像在文件系统驱动器上一样。

trans-unit.source: To view the contents of a provider drive, use the Get-Item or Get-ChildItem cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看提供程序驱动器的内容，请使用 Get-item 或 Get-childitem cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Type the drive name followed by a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 键入驱动器名称后, 跟一个冒号 （:）。

trans-unit.source: For example, to view the contents of the Alias: drive, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要查看别名的内容︰ 驱动器中，键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-item alias:
trans-unit.target: 获取项别名︰

trans-unit.source: You can view and manage the data in any drive from another drive by including the drive name in the path.
trans-unit.target: 您可以查看和管理在任何驱动器中的数据从其他驱动器的路径中包括的驱动器名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, to view the HKLM\Software registry key in the HKLM: drive from another drive, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要查看 HKLM\Software 注册表项中 HKLM︰ 驱动器从另一个驱动器，类型︰

trans-unit.source: get-childitem hklm:\software
trans-unit.target: get-childitem hklm: \software

trans-unit.source: To open the drive, use the Set-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开此驱动器，请使用 Set-location cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Remember the colon when you specify the drive path.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的驱动器路径时，请记住冒号。

trans-unit.source: For example, to change your location to the root directory of the Cert: drive, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要将你的位置更改为根目录下的 Cert︰ 驱动器中，键入︰

trans-unit.source: set-location cert:
trans-unit.target: set-location cert:

trans-unit.source: Then, to view the contents of the Cert: drive, type:
trans-unit.target: 然后，若要查看的内容 Cert︰ 驱动器中，键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-childitem
trans-unit.target: get-childitem

trans-unit.source: MOVING THROUGH HIERARCHICAL DATA
trans-unit.target: 通过分层数据移动

trans-unit.source: You can move through a provider drive just as you would a hard disk drive.
trans-unit.target: 硬盘驱动器上一样，您可以浏览提供程序驱动器。

trans-unit.source: If the data is arranged in a hierarchy of items within items, use a backslash () to indicate a child item.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目中的项的层次结构中的数据排列，使用一个反斜杠来指示子项目。

trans-unit.source: Use the following format:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下格式︰

trans-unit.source: drive:\location\child-location\...
trans-unit.target: 驱动器︰ \location\child-位置\....

trans-unit.source: For example, to change your location to the HKLM\Software registry key, type a Set-Location command, such as:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要将你的位置更改为 HKLM\Software 注册表项中，键入 Set-location 命令，如︰

trans-unit.source: set-location hklm:\software
trans-unit.target: set-location hklm:\software

trans-unit.source: You can also use relative references to locations.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以使用相对引用到的位置。

trans-unit.source: A dot (.) represents the current location.
trans-unit.target: 圆点 （.） 表示当前位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are in the HKLM:\Software\Microsoft registry key, and you want to list the registry subkeys in the HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\PowerShell key, type the following command:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您是在 hklm: \ software\microsoft 注册表项，并且您希望列出 HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\PowerShell 项中的注册表子项，则键入以下命令︰

trans-unit.source: get-childitem .\PowerShell
trans-unit.target: get-childitem。 \PowerShell

trans-unit.source: FINDING DYNAMIC PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 查找动态参数

trans-unit.source: Dynamic parameters are cmdlet parameters that are added to a cmdlet by a provider.
trans-unit.target: 动态参数是由提供程序添加到 cmdlet 的 cmdlet 参数。

trans-unit.source: These parameters are available only when the cmdlet is used with the provider that added them.
trans-unit.target: 仅当将它们添加了提供程序使用此 cmdlet 时，可以使用这些参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Cert: drive adds the CodeSigningCert parameter to the Get-Item and Get-ChildItem cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Cert︰ 驱动器将添加到 Get 项和 Get-childitem cmdlet 的 CodeSigningCert 参数。

trans-unit.source: You can use this parameter only when you use Get-Item or Get-ChildItem in the Cert: drive.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此参数，仅当使用 Get-item 或 Get-childitem 在 Cert︰ 驱动器。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the dynamic parameters that a provider supports, see the Help file for the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序支持的动态参数的列表，请参阅提供程序的帮助文件。

trans-unit.source: Type:
trans-unit.target: 键入：

trans-unit.source: get-help <provider-name>
trans-unit.target: get-help < 提供程序名称 >

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: get-help certificate
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助证书

trans-unit.source: LEARNING ABOUT PROVIDERS
trans-unit.target: 学习有关提供程序

trans-unit.source: Although all provider data appears in drives, and you use the same methods to move through them, the similarity stops there.
trans-unit.target: 虽然提供程序的所有数据都显示在驱动器中，并使用相同的方法来浏览它们，相似性就会停止。

trans-unit.source: The data stores that the provider exposes can be as varied as Active Directory locations and Microsoft Exchange Server mailboxes.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序公开的数据存储可以是 Active Directory 位置和 Microsoft Exchange Server 邮箱一样种类繁多。

trans-unit.source: For information about individual Windows PowerShell providers, type:
trans-unit.target: 有关单个 Windows PowerShell 提供程序的信息，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-help
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: get-help registry
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助注册表

trans-unit.source: For a list of Help topics about the providers, type:
trans-unit.target: 有关提供程序的帮助主题的列表，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: get-help * -category provider
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助 *-类别提供程序

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: about_Locations about_Path_Syntax
trans-unit.target: about_Locations about_Path_Syntax
